About Me




The best portion of a good man's life: his little, nameless unremembered acts of kindness and love.

William Wordsworth



Hi ! I am Anurag, currently in my senior year of undergraduate degree. I am interested in Maths, Programming and Literature. This little blog is primarily for personal use and is meant to keep track of my thoughts and writings. If you find something interesting please drop a line.
